name: apollodeveloperkit
description: Visual debug your app, that is based on Apollo iOS
author: Ryosuke Ito <rito.0305@gmail.com>

scripts.generate:type: npm run generate:type:swift & npm run generate:type:typescript & wait
scripts.generate:type:swift: quicktype -l swift --just-types -t Schema -s schema -o Sources/Classes/Schema/Schema.swift ApolloDeveloperKit.schema.json
scripts.generate:type:typescript: quicktype -l typescript --just-types -t Schema -s schema -o src/schema.ts ApolloDeveloperKit.schema.json
